abstract: Letter from New York City Public Advocate Letitia James comments on August 16 editorial  on California legislation that will automatically enroll millions in retirement savings accounts.
lead_paragraph: New York City’s public advocate writes that too few working Americans have access to retirement savings plans.
snippet: New York City’s public advocate writes that too few working Americans have access to retirement savings plans....

headline.main: Filling In the Retirement Gap, From Coast to Coast
headline.print_headline: Filling In the Retirement Gap, From Coast to Coast
